name: DDS(D.I.Y Drone Simulator) Demo
description:
[Notice]
This demo application is going to deprecate soon.
Please purchase the official version of DDS (D.I.Y Drone Simulator).

DDS is a FPV racing simulator designed for practicing your racing drone flying skills.
You can play FPV racing drone on various spaces. (Stadium, Forest, Parking lot, Downtown ST, )
